biotools.summary: Partial and Joint Decomposiiton (PJD) is a R package for visualizing biologically structured gene expression matrix environment based on low rank models. Currently, it provides user 4 different styles of decomposition: (1) Separately, (2) Concatenately, (3) Jointly, (4) Statistically.

bioschemas.name: PJD
